name: Deflector Shield
desc: Reduces the amount of damage taken by shields by %s and allows the ship to dissipate hard flux at %s of the normal rate while shields are on.
short: Reduces damage taken by shields and allows dissipation of hard flux while shields are up.

name: R-series Astromech Droids
desc: Increases engine and weapon repair speed by %s percent and decreases the amount of time the ship remains disabled by %s percent. Increases combat CR recovery and repair rate by %s percent.
short: Reduced overload time and increased repair speed

name: Class 0.6 Hyperdrive
desc: Reduces  fuel use by %s and increases maximum burn level by %s.
short: Reduces fuel costs and increase max burn level.

name: Tibanna Gas Coolant
desc: Reduces weapons flux generation by %s and increases flux dissipation by %s.
short: Reduces energy weapons flux generation and increases flux dissipation.

name: Kyber Crystal Focus
desc: Increases damage dealt by energy weapons by %s and range of energy weapons by %s.
short: Increases the damge and range of energy weapons.
